entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add RegisterSyntaxNodeStartAction to allow analyzers to immediately bail out from analyzing a file prior to processing nodes. #72053
  • IDE0270 - Cannot simplify for nullable implicit casts #72052
    Backlog
  • Collection expressions lose null safety. #72051
  • Warning AD0001 : Analyzer '' threw an exception of type 'System.NullReferenceException' with message 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.'. #72046

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch analyzer to be a syntax node analyzer #72049
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prevent 'InvalidOperationException' when array is null #72048
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix quick info for anonymous types not escaping identifiers named as keywords #72047
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Only walk into nodes with directives when processing tree for nullable directives. #72050
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove "is final document state" from compilation trackers. #72045
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
